dialog: I narrowly escaped death's grasp, careening down the road at a breakneck speed of forty-five miles per hour. The corner was slick with gravel, and I lost control, skidding towards oblivion.
Indeed, I too was nearly thrown off course. Now then, let's tighten this tourniquet and stem the flow of blood. Wrap the wound with bandages, and then we shall be off. By Merlin's beard, this hurts.
Very well, I am tightening it as we speak. Tell me when to stop.
Mr. James, I know that office hours have come to a close, but might I trouble you to work this weekend and complete the translations?
Alas, I have a prior engagement this weekend. Let me see...
My apologies, but I am willing to offer double pay for your time and effort. Will this do?
That is most generous. When do you require these translations?
I require them by Monday afternoon for a conference. Do you think it can be done?
I shall do my utmost to make it so.
Thank you so much, Mr. James.
Fear not, for your little one is safe and sound in my care.
How may I ever repay your kindness? I am in your debt.
My sincerest apologies, sir. My mode of transportation has failed me.
A shame. Is there anything we can do to assist?
Then I must call for alternative transportation, lest I be tardy.
Greetings. I seek to have my footwear repaired.
Pray, what seems to be the issue?
